thread.title: The Adidas Iniki Runner Boost Is Out in Two Days
thread.title_full: The Adidas Iniki Runner Boost Is Out in Two Days

title: The Adidas Iniki Runner Boost Is Out in Two Days
text:
The Adidas Iniki Runner Boost Is Out in Two Days Sneakerheads, Take Note Now!   Quick Take 
The new kick by Adidas originals is called Adidas Iniki Runner Boost and looks like a little mix of Adidas Gazelle and Ultra Boost. 
The upper body combines soft suede with neoprene and the midsole provides the patented comfort. 
Coming out in two colourways: Navy blue/White and Red/White, the sneaker gives you a modern as well as a vintage feel--the best of both worlds, we'd like to believe. 
If you love your classics, then we assure that this pair of sole is for you to keep. 
This bomb is dropping on January 13 globally and we sure as hell hope it comes to India soon.
